description_localized.en:
Comfortable and well equipped, Classic Rooms feature a Single King / Queen bed or two Single Beds. Measuring 28 Sqm, the room includes a sitting area and a marble bath room.  It can accommodate a maximum of two adults and one child with the existing bedding.  Extra bed is available at a charge. 
Non-Smoking Rooms available.
